titles.title: No Tax Subsidies for E-Cigarette and Tobacco Ads Act
No Tax Subsidies for E-Cigarette and Tobacco Ads Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction for advertising and promotional expenses for tobacco products and electronic nicotine delivery systems.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
No Tax Subsidies for E-Cigarette and Tobacco Ads Act
This bill denies a tax deduction for expenses relating to direct-to-consumer advertising of tobacco products, including electronic nicotine delivery systems.
